document_data.name: Glathra Barcantle
document_data.mainbody: '''Glathra Barcantle''' was a [[War Wizard]] of [[Cormyr]] and the ''de facto'' third-in-command of the organization.
document_data.Personality: Glathra could best be described as rude, imperious, and arrogant and was liked by no one.
document_data.Relationships: Because of her personality, Glathra was disliked by most people she met. She hated [[Elminster Aumar|Elminster]], whom she was convinced was an enemy of Cormyr.
document_data.History: In the {{YearlinkName|1479}}, [[Foril I|King Foril's]] called the Dragon Council when Royal Mage [[Ganrahast]] and his second-in-command [[Vainrence]] were imprisoned by [[Manshoon]] in the palace crypts. At that time, Glathra assumed command of the War Wizards and helped to prevent an uprising by disgruntled nobles.
